internal_testing.description: Core development team and QA testers

external_testing.description: External beta testers - actual pet owners

screening_questions.question: Do you currently own pets that you would track?
How often do you let your pets outside unsupervised?
Have you ever lost a pet or worried about their location?
What's your primary motivation for testing this app?

what_to_test.description: Create profiles for your actual pets with photos and information
steps: Tap '+' to add a new pet
Fill in pet details (name, breed, age)
Add a photo from your library or camera
Save the profile and verify information displays correctly

what_to_test.description: Test GPS tracking accuracy and real-time updates
steps: Move to different locations and verify updates
Check tracking accuracy and update frequency

what_to_test.description: Create geofenced safe zones and test alerts
steps: Go to Safe Zones in pet profile
Create a new safe zone around your location

what_to_test.description: Invite family members and test permission levels
Test all notification types and delivery
Test subscription flow and premium functionality
steps: Test purchase flow (TestFlight users get free access)

questions: How is the app's overall speed and responsiveness?
Does location tracking impact your battery significantly?
Are there any crashes or freezing issues?
Is the interface intuitive and easy to navigate?
Are the pet safety features easy to understand?
What features do you find most/least useful?
How accurate is the GPS tracking?
Do safe zone alerts trigger at the right times?
Any issues with location permissions or setup?
Are notification messages clear and helpful?
